definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 癮頭|瘾头[yin3 tou2]

sentences.english: How could I be so blind to this addiction?
sentences.chinese: 面对瘾头我怎么还能如此盲目？

sentences.english: You are really keen on playing chess.
sentences.chinese: 你们下棋的瘾头可真不小。

sentences.english: Medicines should therefore be designed to break the addiction or supply the poison .
sentences.chinese: 因此，医疗之道应设法打断其瘾头或继续供应毒剂。

definition: (followed by a verb phrase, then – optionally – 不可, or 不行 etc) must
to end abstinence/to resume (drinking) after a break/to break (a taboo)
delighted/to one's heart's content/straightforward/also pr. [tong4 kuai5]
good omen/good luck (in business etc)/profits (gained in gambling, lottery etc)
to enjoy oneself to the full/to one's heart's content
lit. itchy heart/to be itching to do sth (idiom)
immediately/without a moment's hesitation/with alacrity/firing from the hip
interest in dallying/in the mood for playing
